replies.body: From what you posted it looks like you said the phrase "kys". I would assume the IFS (Instant Feedback System) picked up on this and then issued out the ban. You could send in a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and try to appeal the ban. I would also suggest looking at the [Reporting a Player](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) guide because it shows what is unacceptable, gives some pro tips and also tells you what you should avoid doing.

Assuming the log is unedited and there weren't any other games that contributed, I would be pretty confident in saying that this is a false positive. At the very least a false escalation.

The first response you got to your ticket was BlitzBot, which is essentially an automated response designed to answer the "why was I banned" type tickets. False positives are quite rare so it answers that question *most* of the time. The second response seems to have been a generic response, but if this is all there is to the case the ticket probably should have just been escalated. 

If you reply to it again it will naturally escalate and you'll get a personalised response.

Sorry about the drama with that one.

So just to be clear on the timeline, you submitted your ticket, got a response from Blitzbot, replied, got a response saying it would be transferred to the PB team, then got the "no matter how you try to sugarcoat it" response?

They seem a bit out of order to me is why I ask. If that's the order you received them, possibly that third response was written before the ticket was escalated and so didn't have the full context it should have. The PB team is smaller so they usually take a bit longer to reply than that, and would generally go much more in-depth.

I'd probably wait a day or so and see if you get another response, and failing that, reply to the ticket to confirm it's been transferred/being transferred to the PB team.
